description: This course introduces the fundamentals of Natural Language Processing (NLP), covering text processing, sentiment analysis, and language modeling. Learn how to build NLP applications using Python and popular libraries like NLTK and SpaCy.

instructor.name: Emily Carter
instructor.about_course: Natural Language Processing is a rapidly growing field with applications in chatbots, sentiment analysis, and machine translation. This course will teach you the basics of NLP and how to apply it to real-world problems.
instructor.why_take_this_course: NLP is a highly sought-after skill in AI. This course will give you the foundational knowledge and hands-on experience needed to start your journey in NLP and build intelligent language-based applications.

learning_outcomes: Understand the basics of NLP
Learn text preprocessing techniques
Build sentiment analysis models
Explore language modeling
Gain hands-on experience with NLP tools
career_benefits: Prepare for entry-level NLP roles
Gain hands-on experience with NLP tools
Enhance problem-solving and analytical skills
Improve employability in AI-driven industries
Build a foundation for advanced NLP studies
